verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who am I to taste the bread of Angels?
Who am I to be fed with finest wheat?
Who am I that I should eat the bread of Heaven?
Jesus, how could You give something so precious to me?

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Lord by Your mercy and grace
take me into the Holy place.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let Heaven come! Tear down the Heavens and come down.
As Bread of Angels becomes the Bread of man.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Every grace and blessing
over us is flowing,
Every grace and blessing
over us is flowing,
Every grace and blessing
over us is flowing out!

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Let Heaven come! Tear down the Heavens and come down
As Bread of Angels, sanctifies my soul.
